item.title: Grit - Angela Duckworth
item.description: Book Summary - Grit by Angela Duckworth The post is a book summary of the main bullet points from the book “Grit” by “Angela Duckworth” Components of Grit Angela breaks down grit in the following components:- Interest: I love what I do Practice: I will do what it takes to improve and become world-class Purpose: What I do is important for everyone Hope: I will keep going even when itâ€™s difficult
